scripts.predev: powershell -NoProfile -Command "Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 3000 -EA SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -ExpandProperty OwningProcess | Sort-Object -Unique | ForEach-Object { Stop-Process -Id $_ -Force -EA SilentlyContinue }; Start-Sleep -Seconds 1; Write-Host 'Port 3000 cleared'"
